name: PRERNA
briefDescription: The organisation works in the field of advocacy, primary health sector, art & craft sector, social services among the poor especially the tribal mass. We organise medical camps with many fellow organisations such as IMA, Jharkhand Eye Bank & Hospital and Research Center, Jharkhand State Council for Child Welfare, etc to the rural areas. Free medicines are also provided to the people apart from taking specialists to the interior parts of districts covering entire state. Art and Artisans are also encouraged by providing them raw materials in the workshops organised for their livelihood promotion.
